title: Translation Education Intensive Course Utilizing Environment-Based Design

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Basic Translation Theory and Advanced Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: Requires mobile-optimized instructional design considering limited technological environments (no PC access, smartphone-centric).

learning_goals: Learners explain translation strategy design processes by applying Evidence-Based Design (EBD) methodology
Learners apply at least three professional translation techniques (e.g., cultural context reflection, terminology standardization) to practical cases
Learners produce outcomes meeting 80%+ of translation quality evaluation criteria based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
